column5: ..all the augers are gone and the trolling motors are out in their spot!!! The marine isle is back to summer set up.. and the tobogans have been put away!! lol  Spring comes early at CTC !!
yes it does...... around this time last year i was tackle shopping around town and the major guys had all if not most of their winter fishin stuff away.

great heads-up on the probable spring sale at CTC.  just that brampton is a different time and place for most outdoor enthusiasts.  sale ,, no-name lures ,,who- made- lines and size 15 boots.  i'll wait for BPS sale.

this is good news ....means spring is almost here....whoot whoot .....convenient  that CTC is right beside Giant Tiger so i picked up next years valentines chocolates for the wife too...  ...yeah!!!!! i feel good....
oh, and by the way,, i'm not at all jealous of anyone who lives north of barrie.  ok,, maybe a bit.

Sure.. now you tell me!! Leah and I are having Valentines Day tomorrow. She was nice enough to give me a by on the 14th so I could pack for the Temagami Trip!!  You won't find many like her.. I can be quite sure of that !!
